publicationStmt.publisher: Enprynted by me William Caxton in thabbey of Westme[n]stre by london,
publicationStmt.date: fynysshed, and accomplysshed the, viij, day of October, the yere of the incatnacyon of our lord God, M,CCCC,lxxxij and in the xxii yere of the regne of Kyng Edward the fourth [1482]]

notesStmt.note: Beginning pi2r: In the yere of thyncarnacyon .. .--Cf. STC.
Heading, a2r reads: How the land of Englond was fyrst named Albyon, and by what encheson it was so named.
Imperfect; all before leaf a2 lacking.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
